    Content

    content.Rmd

    Learning Compendia

    For each topic, we provide videos, online quizzes, and small programming exercises in R. They are combined in a learning compendium. Links to the individual videos and slides can be found below.

    • ML Basics
    • Supervised Regression
    • Supervised Classification
    • Evaluation
    • Trees
    • Random Forests
    • Tuning

    Machine Learning framework mlr3

    We use the mlr3 framework for many applied ML exercises. Please read the section under References regarding the background material.

    Code Demos

    You can run the code snippets in the demos on your local machine. If you want to render the Rmd files to PDF, you need the accompanying style files.

    Topic Demo Rmd PDF
    Supervised: Regression Linear Model & Gradient Descent Rmd pdf
    Supervised: Regression KNN Rmd pdf
    Supervised: Regression Splines Rmd pdf
    Supervised: Classification Logistic Regression & Newton-Raphson Rmd pdf
    Supervised: Classification Comparison of Classification Methods Rmd pdf
    Supervised: Classification Generative classification methods Rmd pdf
    Evaluation Resampling Rmd pdf
    Evaluation Overfitting Rmd pdf
    Evaluation ROC Rmd pdf
    CART CART Rmd pdf
    Random Forest Random Forests Rmd pdf
    Tuning Nested Resampling Rmd pdf
    Tuning Kaggle Challenge Rmd pdf

    Some of these code demos reference each other, so if you want to run them yourself and experiment with the code (â€¦you definitely should!), make sure you download them all to the same folder.
